Articles.Content:
Does this work? I saw some people having difficulties with it, and I may set up a separate station with another lab if not, but it would make the look and function of my current station much better.

(MPL is the Mobile Processing Labs)
I read "two MLP on one station?" And freaked out. ![:0.0:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_shocked.gif)

I was playing with this a while ago and couldn't get it to work as I was expecting. 

It seemed to treat the two attached MPLs as one. Once one experiment had been processed it couldn't be processed in the other lab. I was going EVA and manually collecting the results and bringing them back to the 2nd MPL but it didn't make a difference. 

Probably better if you want to take along two MPLs is to have them separate on-site - it will mean doubling up on the experiments.
